page.title: 11A HOUSE IN SHEERNESS
page.content: MY HOUSE IS LARGE WITH A FRONT AND BACK GARDEN. THE LONG{HALL}HAS A DARK BROWN CARPET. THE STAIRS HAVE STORAGE SPACE. THE{LOUNGE}HAS DOUBLE-GLAZED BAY WINDOWS AND A BEIGE THREE-PIECE SUITE AND A COFFEE TABLE WITH A FRUIT BOWL.THROUGH AN ARCH IS THE{DINING TABLE AND CHAIRS. A HATCHWAY LEADS THROUGH TO THE KITCHEN. THE{KITCHEN}HAS AN ELECTRIC COOKER 5 CUPBOARDS AND AN ELECTRIC FRIDGE. THERE ARE A RANGE OF FORMICA WORKTOPS. UPSTAIRS THERE IS A{BATHROOM}WITH A BLUE SUITE AND CARPET. ON THE {LANDING}THERE IS A BOOKCASE. MY{MUM'S {BEDROOM}HAS BEIGE CARPETING,A GREEN QUILT AND FLORAL WALLPAPER.MY{SISTER'S {BEDROOM}HAS TWO BEDS WITH BLUE COVERS AND BUTTERFLY WALLPAPER WITH POP POSTERS ALL OVER IT.{MY BEDROOM}HAS A WARDROBE AND BED,GREEN COVERS AND FLORAL WALLPAPER.
